Articles.Content:
Not sure if this is one that the Mods would approve of, but this is mostly intended for laughs.

I'm sure you have watched SNL or other late night shows which will have people saying something completely innocent but get censored unnecessarily.

So, here's how to play:

player 1 gives a sentence

player 2 then censors random parts or the sentence so that is makes a little more amusing. Then gives a new sentence.

Player 3 same as above

I'll start:

I like to play KSP.

I like to p\*\*y k\*p

I like to ride motorcycles.
This has the potential to get really ugly. Just not a good idea.
